verses.roman:
svarūpera saṅge mātra eka sampradāya
svarūpera saṅge seha manda-svara gāya

synonyms: svarūpera saṅge—with Svarūpa Dāmodara; mātra—only; eka—one; sampradāya—group; svarūpera saṅge—with Svarūpa Dāmodara; seha—they; manda-svara—very softly; gāya—chanted.
translation: Thus only one group continued chanting with Svarūpa Dāmodara, and they chanted very softly.
